perturbation.original_text: 9. Arbitration. In the event a dispute arises under this Agreement which cannot be resolved, such dispute shall be submitted to arbitration and resolved by a single arbitrator (who shall be a lawyer) in accordance with the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association then in effect. All such arbitration shall take place at the office of the American Arbitration Association located in or nearest to New York, New York. Each Party is entitled to depose at least two (2) fact witnesses and any expert witness designated by the other Party, and to conduct such other discovery as the arbitrator deems appropriate. The award or decision rendered by the arbitrator shall be final, binding and conclusive and judgment may be entered upon such award by any court.
perturbation.changed_text:
10. Confidentiality and Non-Disparagement. Each Party shall hold all confidential information received pursuant to this Agreement, including the terms and conditions of this Agreement and CELEBRITY'S personal and/or business affairs, confidential and may only disclose them (i) with the prior written consent of the other Party, (ii) where required by law or (iii) to such party's advisors, attorneys or other designees, as long as such recipients also keep such information confidential. Nevertheless, after the parties have announced the association between CELEBRITY and PAPA JOHN's or the association otherwise becomes public, each party may respond, discuss and comment in a favorable and positive manner that CELEBRITY is associated with PAPA JOHN'S during any public events and/or interviews, subject to the requirements herein. All Parties agree not to disparage or make derogatory comments, verbal or written, regarding the other Party during the Term of the Agreement, and for one year thereafter.

9. Arbitration. In the event a dispute arises under this Agreement which cannot be resolved, such dispute shall be addressed via a method agreed upon by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the arbitration clause to a section focused on confidentiality and non-disparagement makes it less prominent and easily overlooked. Additionally, changing the specifics of how the dispute will be solved is no longer in line with the American Arbitration Association, which weakens the enforceability of that part of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: C. Governing Law. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to its principles of conflicts of law.
perturbation.changed_text: C. Governing Law. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with principles of law.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the specification of Delaware law and substituting it with 'principles of law' introduces significant ambiguity. It is no longer clear which jurisdiction's laws will govern the contract, making it difficult to determine which legal standards will apply and potentially hindering enforcement.
